group_1.narration: Up until a few days ago, the Tokime Clan village@where Shizuka, Sunao, and I live@was controlled by Granny Mikoshiba,@the priestess who led the Diviners.
She said girls like us were meant@to sacrifice our lives to the gods...
But in reality,@she was using us to make Kyubey grant@other people's wishes in exchange for bribes.
That's unforgivable, but...the thing is,@considering how cut off this village is from society,@we really needed that money in order to keep going.

Now that she's gone,@we Diviners no longer need to sacrifice our lives,@but it also means the village@doesn't have enough money to sustain itself.@So every day, my mom has been leading discussions@with the other adults about what we should do next...

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Well...@From what I can tell...
It looks like Mikoshiba owned some security bonds.
I don't know the market value, but...
If we can sell them, that may be enough money@to last us a while.

group_1.textRight: Oh, that's good news!

group_1.textLeft: Not so fast.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Mikoshiba had no heirs and left no will,
so it'll be hard for us to acquire the securities@anytime soon.

group_1.textRight: Is that how it is?

group_1.textLeft: Mm-hmm.
The inheritance process will take several months,@and—

group_1.textRight: Several months?!
What are we supposed to do in the meantime?

group_1.textLeft: We don't have much cash left in the safe.
We'll have to ask our residents to travel to the@neighboring mountain village to find work.

group_1.textRight: But even then...
Most of us have never gone outside the village.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's right...
Plus, Kawano's old man has a bad knee.@He can barely walk.

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* It's one problem after another...
Alright, I'll explain the situation to everyone once@we're done.

group_1.textCenter: Hey, Mom!@There has to be some way I can help you guys!

group_1.textRight: Why, thank you, Chiharu.
But there's nothing you can do right now.

group_1.textLeft: Huhh?@But...
I can at least get in touch with Grandpa and explain@what's happening!

group_1.textRight: Really?
All right, what do you remember about what we@were just talking about?

group_1.textLeft: Um...
Granny Mikoshiba is gone, and the village is running@out of money! We're in trouble!
That's it, right?

group_1.textRight: ...You're not wrong, but you're leaving out too@many details.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh...

group_1.textRight: This isn't something you need to worry about—@leave it to us adults.
Kids should be kids. Go out and play.

group_1.textLeft: You don't have to kick me out just because I'm@young...

group_1.textRight: Nope, off you go.
...Say, why don't you give Shizuka a hand?
She needs to get in touch with the different branches@of the Tokime Clan since they're spread all over the@country.
She must be having a hard time with that, right?
Maybe you can help her.

group_1.textLeft: I...I guess...
(I don't want to just sit around and be useless...)
Yeah...okay, I'll go talk to her.
Hey! Good morning, Charu!

group_1.textRight: Say, are you guys headed somewhere?
Wait, could it be the only way to contact the other branches is by visiting them in person?!

group_1.textLeft: No, we were just making our way over to the@mountains.

group_1.textRight: Oh, so you're just going out—@[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:102601:lipSynch_1]huh? Didn't you need to call the other families?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, I kind of hit a wall there...
I need to take a little break from all that.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: It's hard to convince people about everything when@I call them out of the blue...
I just can't make any progress in talking to them.

group_1.textRight: So that's what's up...

group_1.textLeft: Hence why I invited Shizuka to join me in harvesting@some daidaikko.
I thought it would make for a nice change of pace.

group_1.textRight: “Daidaikko”...@[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102601:lipSynch_1]Oh, so it's like a persimmon!
Hey, you guys mind if I join you?

group_1.textLeft: Of course.@I look forward to working with you.

group_1.textRight: Same here!
